General.Name: Sarawak Consolidated Industries Bhd
General.Description: Sarawak Consolidated Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells concrete products for use in the construction and infrastructure sectors primarily in Malaysia. The company operates through four segments: Manufacturing, Corporate, Property Trading, and Construction/EPCC/Project Management. It offers pre-stressed spun piles, reinforced concrete square piles, spun concrete pipes, reinforced concrete box culverts, U-drains, pre-stressed beams, concrete pipes, and concrete roof tiles, as well as industrialized building system components, such as hollow core slabs, wall panels, and column and beam. The company engages in the construction contracts, engineering, procurement, construction, and commissioning activities, as well as property development activities. Sarawak Consolidated Industries Berhad was formerly known as Sarawak Concrete Industries Berhad and changed its name to Sarawak Consolidated Industries Berhad in July 2009. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Kuching, Malaysia.
